title: Media Media
description:
Edmund Lee, media journalist for The New York Times, joins the Slate Money hosts to discuss the demented rollercoaster that is Tesla stock, The New York Times’ surprising subscription numbers and the revenue of Youtube and other social media sites.
Plus: Spotify buying The Ringer.
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
